name: Rapid Produce Dating Simulator
description:
Controls

Harvest = Right Arrow Key

Reject = Left Arrow Key

Space bar = Continue / Restart

How to Play

[See How to Play screen In-Game for more info]

Each card has 3 traits: Title, Photo, Description

Each trait is either Positive or Negative

Cards with at least 2 negative traits should be discarded

Cards with at least 2 positive traits should be harvested

Decide which produce to swipe left on to discard or swipe right on to harvest

Created by:

Pixel Artist - Tony Redmer

Programmer - Andy Redmer

Concept Artist - Elora Redmer

Voice Over Actors - Andy, Elora, Tony, Adam, Chris, Kate, Andrew

Background Music & Sfx
